{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T19:18:15.000Z", "description": "

 

Job Tittle:- Site Reliability Engineer

Job Location:- Alpharetta, GA.

Job Type: Long term Contract


  

  Responsibilities:

  

 \u2022 Run the production environment by monitoring availability and taking a holistic view of system health

\u2022 Manage platform infrastructure and applications

\u2022 Improve reliability, quality, and time-to-market of our suite of software solutions

\u2022 Measure and optimize system performance.

\u2022 Provide primary operational support and engineering for multiple large distributed software applications

 

  Requirements:

  

 \u2022 Deploy software artifacts to Development, QA, Integration, UAT, Staging, Load and Production environments

\u2022 Configure and troubleshoot software runtime environment, provide development support and Incident support

\u2022 Lead the rollout, enforcement and continuous improvement of team and enterprise standards

\u2022 Configuring Continuous Integration and/or Continuous Delivery pipelines

\u2022 Use continuous Integration tools: Jenkins, Sonar, Ant, Maven, Nexus, Rundeck, CHEF, Sonar

\u2022 Use of code repository tools like GIT

\u2022 Contribute to the design and implementation of our configuration management software architecture

\u2022 Design and implementation of tools to streamline SCM, Integration and QA processes

\u2022 Define, implement and champion policies to significantly increase the efficiency of our software development/delivery process

\u2022 Ensure Continuous Integration and Delivery through SDLC. Work with Development, QA and Operations to guarantee prompt, accurate, and repeatable delivery of the builds

\u2022 Provide up-to-date and accurate documentation on the SCM environment and Process Automation tools

\u2022 Work closely with Development and Quality Engineering teams

\u2022 Experience in one of the clouds (Azure/GCP/AWS).

\u2022 Experience in Java based application deployment on application servers like WebSphere and tomcat.

\u2022 Experience I vulnerability management and applying software patches

\u2022 UAT/Production deployments

\u2022 Experience with Agile practices \u00a7 Good team player and coordination skills

\u2022 Candidate should be a Green Card Holder or a US Citizen

 

 

Regards 

Kajal 

IT Recruiter 

+1.307-316-7195 |Kajalsaini@noralogic.com|www.noralogic.com 

Noralogic | 109 E 17th St, Cheyenne WY 82001 

USA: WY, MD, NJ 

Mexico: Guadalajara, Monterrey 

India: Noida UP 

**WBE and MBE company** 

** ISO 9001:2015** 

**WY Top 50 Minority owned growing company**
